Lack enough support: The claim lacks credible media or police reports to support the occurrence of accidental cremations in New York City during the COVID-19 crisis.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the story originated on a satirical website and is labeled as satire.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the incident by presenting it as a real event when it is a satirical article.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that an overworked funeral home employee was accidentally cremated during the COVID-19 crisis without providing any evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: There are alternative explanations for the claim, such as it being a satirical article published on a satirical website.
